title: Transferring from iPhone to Pixel. Are Live Photos copied?
content: I know that when backing photos up to Google Photos from an iPhone, the Live Photos are retained and can be viewed. What I want to know is, when transferring form an iPhone to a new Pixel and copying data over the smart connector to set it up, do the Live Photos get copied as well?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
